testcase.name: A product is successfully added to the cart - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on flipKart home page.....................................passed When I enter product name in the search bar "zippyque Headphone design winter".passed And I will click the Search button..........................................passed Then I would be navigated to search page....................................passed When I will click on my product.............................................passed Then I should be navigated to product's detail page.........................passed When I click the Add to Cart button.........................................passed Then the product should be added to the cart................................passed And the cart count should update accordingly................................passed
